renji-abarai.name: Renji Abarai
renji-abarai.quote: I haven't been fighting to defeat you. I've been fighting to win!
renji-abarai.description: Lieutenant of Squad 6 under Captain Kuchiki, Renji's fierce determination drives him to constantly improve. Childhood friends with Rukia Kuchiki, he strives to surpass his Captain while maintaining his street-smart attitude and loyalty to his friends. As a Hybrid Range fighter, he combines powerful Melee attacks with unique Ranged abilities, featuring a Giant Summon through his Awakening, that allows him to sweep massive areas of the battlefield using his Bankai, Hihio Zabimaru. His Balanced playstyle allows him to adapt to various situations while maintaining consistent pressure. With high Speed and Range, good Power and Defense, but lower Technique, Renji excels at overwhelming opponents with his small but consistent moveset and extending combos.
renji-abarai.tldr: The hothead, but caring, Squad 6 Lieutenant. Trounces foes in battle using his blade's variable length. A rare fighter that is balanced and able to fight from any range. Especially strong in mid-to-long-range combat with his astonishing Signature Move 'Sweep'. You will be left wide open, however, so it's important to use it in conjunction with other moves. Also, his Awakened state boasts overwhelming reach and attack power, letting him heavily sway the course of battle. However, his abilities decrease once his Bankai is gone, so make sure to time his Awakening carefully.

base.name: Signature Move: Sweep
base.description: Unfurl Zabimaru to strike a wide area. Huge attack area, and deals Reishi damage through Guard. However, it takes time to unleash, and striking with the tip does fewer hits. Additional inputs after hit lets you do up to two follow-up attacks, and can transition into Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash mid-move.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Tsumuji Kaze
base.description: Brandish Zabimaru to spend your foe flying. Deals Reishi damage through Guard. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
base.description: Fire yourself up, dramatically boosting Signature Move strength, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage for a while.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash
base.description: A leaping slash with an unfurled Zabimaru. Takes time to unleash, but has a wide attack area and greatly depletes the Guard Gauge as well as dealing Reishi damage through Guard. Lets you move first when blocked.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Hihio Zabimaru
awakened.description: A special Awakening for Renji Abarai. Activates Bankai, releasing Hihio Zabimaru. Continues for a set period of time, or until Renji's Reishi reaches 0%. All attacks are powered up during Bankai, and attacks no longer make you flinch due to the additional Super Armor.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Haineko Area
awakened.description: The signature ability of Rangiku Matsumoto. Use Signature Move 'Haineko Spread' or Spiritual Pressure Move 2 'Haikai' to generate a Haineko Area. Zanpakuto attacks resonate with the Haineko Area, inflicting attacks that deal damage.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Grand Sweep
awakened.description: Sweep Hihio Zabimaru across a wide area. Consumes 15 Reiatsu when activated, and deals Reishi damage through Guard. The attack unleashes comparitively quickly, making it easy to use.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Toguro Senpu
awakened.description: Coil Hihio Zabimaru around you before releasing it. Activates very quickly and sends the opponent flying on hit, letting you use it to turn the fight's momentum. Deals Reishi damage through Guard.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
awakened.description: Fire yourself up, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Boosts attack power, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Grand Thrust
awakened.description: Extend Hihio Zabimaru in a straight line to attack. Very slow to unleash, but can reduce Reishi even when guarded.

weakened.name: Weakened: Post-Bankai State
weakened.description: The state after ending a Bankai, when a set period of time passed or Reishi is at 0%. Attack strength and range is weakened dramatically.

weakened.name: Signature Move: Hado #31 - Shakkaho
weakened.description: Take a stance to receive an attack. Taking an attack during this stance unleashes a counter by Hado #31 - Shakkaho. Shakkaho's explosion deals damage to anyone caught up in the blast - yourself included.

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Tsumuji Kaze
weakened.description: Spin to attack the area around you. Deals Reishi damage through Guard. Though it lacks range, you're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
weakened.description: Fire yourself up, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Lets you use the same actions as in Normal State (Base). This dramatically boosts Signature Move strength, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage.

weakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash
weakened.description: A leaping slash. Its power and attack area are much weaker compared to Normal State.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Howl, Zabimaru!
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Hikotsu Taiho
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Weakened Kikon Move 1: Higa Zekkō
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

Step Quick Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
